scroll-start.name: scroll-start
scroll-start.value: [ auto | start | end | center | left | right | top | bottom | <length-percentage [0,∞]> ]{1,2}

scroll-start-x.name: scroll-start-x
scroll-start-x.percentages: relative to the corresponding axis of the scroll container’s scrollport
scroll-start-x.computedValue: the keyword auto or a computed <length-percentage> value

scroll-start-y.name: scroll-start-y
scroll-start-y.percentages: relative to the corresponding axis of the scroll container’s scrollport
scroll-start-y.computedValue: the keyword auto or a computed <length-percentage> value

scroll-start-inline.percentages: relative to the corresponding axis of the scroll container’s scrollport
scroll-start-inline.computedValue: the keyword auto or a computed <length-percentage> value
